trans-unit.source: Represents an asymmetric key for X.509 certificates.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma chave assimétrica para certificados X.509.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> that represents the X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> que representa o certificado X.509.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509AsymmetricSecurityKey" /> class using the specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509AsymmetricSecurityKey" />, usando o certificado X.509 especificado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificate" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm to decrypt the key.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo de criptografia para descriptografar a chave.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains the encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> que contém a chave criptografada.

trans-unit.source: Decrypts the specified encrypted key using the specified cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Descriptografa a chave criptografada especificada usando o algoritmo de criptografia especificado.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains the decrypted key.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> que contém a chave descriptografada.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl> fields to specify the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url> ou <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl> campos para especificar o algoritmo.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate specified in the constructor does not have a private key.
trans-unit.target: O certificado X.509 especificado no construtor não tem uma chave privada.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate has a private key, but it was not generated using the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: O certificado X.509 tem uma chave privada, mas não foi gerado usando o algoritmo <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate has a private key, it was generated using the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> algorithm, but the <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm.KeyExchangeAlgorithm" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O certificado X.509 tem uma chave privada; ela foi gerada usando o algoritmo <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" />, mas a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm.KeyExchangeAlgorithm" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="algorithm" /> parameter is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Não há suporte para o parâmetro <paramref name="algorithm" />.

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url" /> and <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl" />.
trans-unit.target: Os algoritmos compatíveis são <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url" /> e <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl" />.

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm to encrypt the key.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo de criptografia para criptografar a chave.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains the key to encrypt.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> que contém a chave a criptografar.

trans-unit.source: Encrypts the specified encrypted key using the specified cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Criptografa a chave criptografada especificada usando o algoritmo de criptografia especificado.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains the encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> que contém a chave criptografada.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl> fields to specify the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url> ou <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl> campos para especificar o algoritmo.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate specified in the constructor has a public key that was not generated using the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: O certificado X.509 especificado no construtor tem uma chave pública que não foi gerada usando o algoritmo <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="algorithm" /> parameter is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Não há suporte para o parâmetro <paramref name="algorithm" />.

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url" /> and <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl" />.
trans-unit.target: Os algoritmos compatíveis são <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url" /> e <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl" />.

trans-unit.source: The asymmetric algorithm to create.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo assimétrico a criar.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when a private key is required to create the algorithm; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> quando uma chave privada é necessária para criar o algoritmo; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified asymmetric cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o algoritmo de criptografia assimétrico especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm" /> that represents the specified asymmetric cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm" /> que representa o algoritmo de criptografia assimétrico especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> fields to specify the `algorithm` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> ou <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> campos para especificar o `algorithm` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="privateKey" /> is <see langword="true" /> and the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor does not have a private key.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="privateKey" /> é <see langword="true" /> e o certificado X.509 especificado no construtor não tem uma chave privada.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="algorithm" /> is <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" /> and the public or private key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="algorithm" /> é <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" /> e a chave pública ou privada do certificado X.509 especificado no construtor não é do tipo <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="algorithm" /> is <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" /> or <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" /> and the public or private key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="algorithm" /> é <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" /> ou <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" /> e a chave pública ou privada do certificado X.509 especificado no construtor não é do tipo <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="algorithm" /> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="algorithm" /> não é suportado.

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" />, and <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />.
trans-unit.target: Os algoritmos compatíveis são <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" /> e <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />.

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo hash.

trans-unit.source: Gets a cryptographic algorithm that generates a hash for a digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um algoritmo de criptografia que gera um hash para uma assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm" /> that generates hashes for digital signatures.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm" /> que gera hashes para assinaturas digitais.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> fields to specify the `algorithm` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> ou <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> campos para especificar o `algorithm` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="algorithm" /> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="algorithm" /> não é suportado.

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" />, and <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />.
trans-unit.target: Os algoritmos compatíveis são <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" /> e <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />.

trans-unit.source: The de-formatter algorithm for the digital signature to get an instance of.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo desformatador para a assinatura digital da qual obter uma instância.

trans-unit.source: Gets the de-formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o algoritmo desformatador para a assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter" /> that represents the de-formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter" /> que representa o algoritmo desformatador para a assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> fields to specify the `algorithm` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> ou <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> campos para especificar o `algorithm` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="algorithm" /> is <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" /> and the public key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="algorithm" /> é <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" /> e a chave pública do certificado X.509 especificado no construtor não é do tipo <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="algorithm" /> is <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" /> or <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" /> and the public key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="algorithm" /> é <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" /> ou <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" /> e a chave pública do certificado X.509 especificado no construtor não é do tipo <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="algorithm" /> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="algorithm" /> não é suportado.

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />,
trans-unit.target: Os algoritmos compatíveis são <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />,

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" />, and <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" /> e <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />.

trans-unit.source: The formatter algorithm for the digital signature to get an instance of.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo formatador para a assinatura digital da qual obter uma instância.

trans-unit.source: Gets the formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o algoritmo formatador para a assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter" /> that represents the formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter" /> que representa o algoritmo formatador para a assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> fields to specify the `algorithm` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> ou <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> campos para especificar o `algorithm` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate specified in the constructor does not have a private key.
trans-unit.target: O certificado X.509 especificado no construtor não tem uma chave privada.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="algorithm" /> is <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" /> and the private key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="algorithm" /> é <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" /> e a chave privada do certificado X.509 especificado no construtor não é do tipo <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="algorithm" /> is <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" /> or <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" /> and the private key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="algorithm" /> é <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" /> ou <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" /> e a chave privada do certificado X.509 especificado no construtor não é do tipo <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="algorithm" /> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="algorithm" /> não é suportado.

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />,
trans-unit.target: Os algoritmos compatíveis são <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />,

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" />, and <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" /> e <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the private key is a available.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a chave privada está disponível.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when the private key is available; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> quando a chave privada está disponível; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo de criptografia.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm uses asymmetric keys.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o algoritmo especificado usa chaves assimétricas.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when the specified algorithm is <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.DsaSha1Signature" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaOaepKeyWrap" />, or <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaV15KeyWrap" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> quando o algoritmo especificado é <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.DsaSha1Signature" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaOaepKeyWrap" /> ou <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaV15KeyWrap" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo de criptografia.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm is supported by this class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o algoritmo especificado é compatível com essa classe.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when the specified algorithm is <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" />, or <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" /> and the public key is of the right type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> quando o algoritmo especificado é <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" /> ou <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" /> e a chave pública é do tipo correto; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509AsymmetricSecurityKey.IsSupportedAlgorithm%2A> method returns `true` when one of the following is true:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509AsymmetricSecurityKey.IsSupportedAlgorithm%2A> método retorna `true` quando uma das seguintes condições for verdadeira:

trans-unit.source: The `algorithm` parameter is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl> and the public key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is of type <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>.
trans-unit.target: O `algorithm` parâmetro é <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl> e a chave pública do certificado x. 509 especificado no construtor é do tipo <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>.

trans-unit.source: The `algorithm` parameter is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> and the public key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is of type <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>.
trans-unit.target: O `algorithm` parâmetro é <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> ou <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> e a chave pública do certificado x. 509 especificado no construtor é do tipo <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>.

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo de criptografia.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm uses symmetric keys.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o algoritmo especificado usa chaves simétricas.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when the specified algorithm is <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.HmacSha1Signature" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128Encryption" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192Encryption" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256Encryption" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesEncryption" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128KeyWrap" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192KeyWrap" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256KeyWrap" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesKeyWrap" />, or <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Psha1KeyDerivation" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> quando o algoritmo especificado é <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.HmacSha1Signature" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128Encryption" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192Encryption" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256Encryption" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesEncryption" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128KeyWrap" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192KeyWrap" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256KeyWrap" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesKeyWrap" /> ou <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Psha1KeyDerivation" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size, in bits, of the public key associated with the X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho, em bits, da chave pública associada ao certificado X.509.

trans-unit.source: The size, in bits, of the public key associated with the X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho, em bits, da chave pública associado ao certificado x. 509.
